fields.text: Welcome to Eventbrite in San Francisco, where you can find your next experience.
For ticket purchases and order inquiries, press [INDEX].
To check the status of an existing order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to an order support specialist.
To buy new tickets for upcoming experiences, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we direct you to our ticketing service.
To plan, create, or manage your event on our platform, press [INDEX].
To create a new event and start selling tickets, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our event creation team.
To manage or update an existing event, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to event management support.
